title: House
body: I got the official word from my realtor, <a href="http://www.nothnagle.com/agent/AgentDetail.asp?CEQ_AgentCode=25535">Dave</a>, today that the offer I made was approved in writing by the sellers bank today.  So it's <strong>FINALLY</strong> officially approved.  I made the original purchase offer back on April 4th (04/04/04), so it's been awhile.  What sucks is that the <a href="http://www.nyhomes.org/sony/intRate.html#RemodelNY">interest rate</a> for the <a href="http://www.nyhomes.org/sony/AchLim02.htm">SONYMA</a> (sunny may) went up a quarter of a percent just TWO STINKING days ago.  I wish I could reduce my offer by the amount of money the sellers bank has cost me by taking its sweet ass time.  Ah well, I'll post pix and stuff later.  It's funny because they still have snow in them.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-07-02

House

I got the official word from my realtor,
